content: Hi, on the page http://hl7.org/fhir/2017Jan/downloads.html , there is in the FHIR Definitions section a special set of temporary STU 3 definitions for Forge that can be downloaded. I have downloaded the file and extracted the xml and other schema contents, but it seems I cannot use it directly through Forge. Could anyone please give instructions on how to use them in Forge?
it involves a fair bit of hacking for Forge, and is only imperfectly supported, so Furore haven't documented it yet. @Michel Rutten might choose to say more

Hi @Omar El-Begawy we only actively support this for our customers with a commercial support contract on Forge and Simplifier. I'd be happy to provide you with more details. Please contact me if you'd like to know more.
hello everyone, please can anyone help to create nested extension using clinfhir?
@Jayashree Surnar try the clinFHIR stream
